result.markdown:
--- title: Oblique stem in a sonorant author: Kostya Filatov date: 'Last update: 2024-02-25' output: html_document: number_sections: true anchor_sections: true pandoc_args: --shift-heading-level-by=-1 --- We collected a set of 15 nouns with oblique stems in sonorant in attributive form. The maps show the sonorant that is present in an oblique stem formant: /r/ (value: R, e. g. *git-ɨr-dɨ* cat-OBL-ATTR), /l/ (value: L, e. g. *naʁ-ul-dɨ* teardrop-OBL-ATTR), /j/ (value: J, e. g. *naʁ-uji-d* teardrop-OBL-ATTR) or NO CONSONANT, if there is none. ## ‘moon’ ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Map ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Data ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
